heroMessage: E-MADE is a youth-led initiative that tackles the growing crisis of electronic waste by collecting, safely recycling, and repurposing discarded electronics. The project reduces toxic pollution from improper dumping and burning of e-waste while transforming valuable components into new products for community use. Through public education, hands-on innovation, and responsible recycling practices, E-MADE protects human health, creates green skills for young people, and promotes a circular economy where electronics are reused instead of wasted.
